name: Arcadia: A Time Forgotten (OFFICIAL DEMO)
description:
"Arcadia is neither good nor evil, but merely a place for good and evil"

Welcome to Arcadia! A Realm of Magic and Mystery. You play as Aureas Pias, a war hero who, upon returning from the war on the western continent, is tasked by the gods with righting the wrongs commited during his time at war, so that a cursed mask can be taken off his head. Will he be able to remove the mask? Will the gods be satisfied with his efforts?
